header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.description: Find answers to common questions about our programs, admissions, and more.

teamIntro.title: We Have An Expert Team
teamIntro.description: We are a passionate, creative, and results-driven team of digital marketing specialists, strategists, designers, and technologists — all working together to help brands grow in the digital world.

items.question: Are there opportunities to work with schools or organizations?

children.text: We partner with schools, edtech organizations, and NGOs to offer real-world implementation opportunities for your projects.
The program runs for 12 weeks, designed to fit alongside studies or work with flexible deadlines.

items.question: Can I participate if I'm currently a student or only after graduation?

children.text: We welcome current students, recent graduates, early-career professionals, educators, and changemakers who are committed to learning and building in the education-technology space.
We invite educators and community leaders who are passionate about digital education and social impact.

items.question: Is there a cost or equity requirement?

children.text: No cost, no equity taken. The program is completely free and fully sponsored.

items.question: Will I earn credits or a certificate?

children.text: Yes! You'll receive a verified certificate upon completion, and in some cases, university credit recommendations through our academic partners.

items.question: Are there any prerequisites or prior knowledge required?

children.text: Absolutely none. Whether you're a complete beginner or experienced builder, everyone starts from where they are.

items.question: How much time per week should I plan for the program?

children.text: Expect to dedicate 8–12 hours per week. It's self-paced with live sessions, project work, and mentorship.

stillHaveQuestions.title: Still have questions?
stillHaveQuestions.description: We are a passionate, creative, and results-driven team of digital marketing specialists, strategists, designers, and technologists — all working together to help brands grow in the digital world.
